name: ｅｘｉｔ
description:
Weekly Game Jam #21 Entry - EXIT

Theme: "Save A Life"

Summary: You play as a stalker, tasked with saving Your Beloved's life on tape using a video camera.

As the stalker, you are to locate the video camera hidden somewhere in town. Using the camera, you must record at least 6 seconds of footage of Your Beloved before the EXIT will reveal itself, allowing you to advance to the next stage.
